comments.author: Mic Perez

comments.text:
Hehe, no problem. I can't do it either, but I've gone to those places for 
years. From what I know, you're supposed to pull the wax parallel to the 
skin, not upwards, because this will cause the hair to break instead of 
pulling it from the root. Very long hair hurts more, but it will get 
trapped in the wax better, so it will be removed better. Also, what's with 
that weird pattern? A normal person would go covering stripes, I guess, not 
random chunks.
I do get it's for fun's sake, though. It's funnier this way because he ends 
up with that mess XD
Does anyone else think he looked good before? Just don't fight nature, lol
